text: "Time Stand Still" is a 1987 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush and is the leading single from their 12th studio album Hold Your Fire. It went to number 3 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks charts, number 52 in Canada and number 42 in the United States. It was released as a duet with Aimee Mann and was covered by Nelly Furtado. title: Time Stand Still (song)
